players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Alice remained silent during the discussion, which might be suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
